conversation.content: I need to switch from electronic statements to paper statements for my account immediately.
Certainly. I can help you with that change today. May I have your account number or the phone number associated with your account?
The account number is the one ending in four-seven-three-nine.
Thank you. I'm pulling up account 88294739 now, and I can see you've been enrolled in electronic statements since March 2022.
Correct. I need physical copies for tax documentation purposes going forward.
I understand completely. Many customers require paper statements for record-keeping, and I can activate that service effective with your next statement cycle on the 15th.
Will I receive the past three months retroactively as well?
Absolutely. I can generate paper copies of your last 3 statements, which cover June through August, and mail those within 5 business days.
Perfect. What address will those be sent to?
They'll be mailed to your registered address at 4521 Oak Boulevard, Suite 200, unless you need them sent elsewhere.
That address is correct. Can you confirm the timeline once more?
Of course.
And there's no additional fee for switching to paper statements?
Your account type, Premier Business Plus, includes paper statements at no charge, so you won't see any additional fees on your monthly service charge of $29.95.
Excellent. How will I know the change has been processed?
You'll receive confirmation email within 2 hours to your registered email address, and the retroactive statements will arrive via USPS Priority Mail with tracking number.
That works perfectly. Will future statements arrive before the payment due date?
Yes, statements generate on the 15th of each month and typically arrive 3 to 5 business days later, giving you at least 10 days before your payment due date.
Thank you. This resolves everything I needed today.
You're very welcome. I've completed the change to paper statements effective immediately, and your confirmation number is REF-82947-STMT for your records.
